title: Enel
description: Enel's brand colors are vibrant and diverse, reflecting the dynamic and innovative spirit of the company. These progressive hues, ranging from bold red (#E4010A) and invigorating pink (#E70066) to a serene blue (#006FBB) and fresh green (#009A7A), embody the company's commitment to sustainability and innovation. Sourced from Enel's official branding guidelines, these colors are a key element in representing the brand's identity.
